00072 int SymmetricMultiSlaterDetRead(FILE* fp, MultiSlaterDet* MB)
00073 {
00074   *MB = SymmetricMultiSlaterDet;
00075 
00076   SymmetricMultiSlaterDetInternals* internals = 
00077     malloc(sizeof(SymmetricMultiSlaterDetInternals));
00078 
00079   char buf[1024];
00080   fgets(buf, 1024, fp);
00081 
00082   int n;

00084   sscanf(buf, "<SymmetricMultiSlaterDet n=%d Sym=%s>", &n, sym);
00085   extractSymmetryfromString(&s, &internals->S);
00086 
00087   MB->n = n;
00088   internals->Q = malloc(n*sizeof(SlaterDet));
00089   internals->w = malloc(n*sizeof(complex double));
00090

00093   while (strncmp(buf, "<Weights", 8));

00095   double wre, wim;
00096   char* c = strtok(buf+8, ", ()");
00097   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00098     wre=atof(c); c=strtok(NULL, " ,()");
00099     wim=atof(c); c=strtok(NULL, " ,()");
00100     internals->w[i] = wre+I*wim;
00101   }
00102 
00103   int ret=0;
00104   for (i=0; i<n; i++)

00106 
00107   MB->A = internals->Q[0].A;
